sections.Benefit: Choose two Craft, Perform, or Profession skills in any combination (two Craft skills, a Craft skill and a Perform skill, and so on). You receive a +2 bonus on checks with these skills. If you have 10 or more ranks in any one of these skills, the bonus increases to +4 for that skill.
sections.Special: You can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time you take the feat, it applies to two new skills.
